types.name: Amateur
types.description: Fireworks intended for recreational use during holiday celebrations

types.name: Experienced
types.description: Fireworks intended for use by experienced users during events

types.name: Professional
types.description: Fireworks intended for professional use during large events

types.name: Small
types.description: Explosives intended for exploding army men.

types.name: Medium
types.description: Explosives intended for small-scale demolition. Not for use by amateurs.

types.name: Large
types.description: Explosives intended for large-scale demolition such as buildings. For professional use only. Must have all certifications up to date.
